description: Guidde lets you capture instant step-by-step videos and documents for anyone to create.
title: guiddeãƒ»Magically create video documentation with AI
introduction: Guidde is a generative AI platform for business that helps teams create video documentation 11x faster. It allows users to create stunning how-to guides and SOPs with AI. The platform captures know-how faster with AI and explains complex flows in seconds through AI-generated video documentation.
features: Magic Capture: Easily capture your flow using a browser extension.
Powered by GPT: Automatically create a step-by-step description of your workflow.
AI Generated Voiceover: Choose from over 100 different voices and languages for voiceovers.
Editor: Design visually appealing content without the need for professional design skills.
Smart Sharing: Share guides easily with links or embed them in your organization.
pricing: Free Extension available. Sign up for more features and pricing details.

faqs.question: What is Guidde?
faqs.answer: Guidde is a generative AI platform that helps teams create video documentation faster using AI.

faqs.question: How can I capture my flow with Guidde?
faqs.answer: You can capture your flow using the browser extension by clicking capture and then stop when you're done.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes, there is a free extension available for Guidde.
